ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Scars of Velious
ygData.msgSnippet: the specific bard disciplines are quite nice actually.  and the inventory screen in full screen mode is just awesome.  works while looting and banking as well,
ygData.messageBody:
the specific bard disciplines are quite nice actually. and the inventory
screen in full screen mode is just awesome. works while looting and banking
as well, but not trades.

Shada, 57.9 bard
Afterlife


> Bards get these special disciplines:
> DEFTDANCE (Level 55 - Velious Only): Auto dodge and auto
> dual-wield. This discipline lasts for 10 seconds, and has a
> base reuse time of 72 minutes.
>
> PURETONE (Level 60 - Velious Only): Makes it as if you are
> wielding the best instrument of every type, whether or not
> you are actually wielding an instrument. This discipline
> lasts for 2 minutes, and has a base reuse time of 72 minutes.
>
> There's also many UI changes, like being able to close some
> of the overlays in full screen mode, and being able to access
> inven in full screen (didn't read much about this).
